componentDescription: The Fade transition is used by the Modal component. It uses react-transition-group internally.

propDescriptions.appear: Perform the enter transition when it first mounts if in is also true. Set this to false to disable this behavior.
propDescriptions.children:
A single child content element.
⚠️ Needs to be able to hold a ref.
propDescriptions.easing: The transition timing function. You may specify a single easing or a object containing enter and exit values.
propDescriptions.in: If true, the component will transition in.
propDescriptions.timeout: The duration for the transition, in milliseconds. You may specify a single timeout for all transitions, or individually with an object.
